titleStmt.title: Holy Thursday
Sermo in cena domini ad paenitentes

handNote.p: Main hand: Exeter type, c-shaped accents, corrects himself.
Annotator: consistently changes i into ẏ.

s.w: geh i ẏ r&slongdes;umn i ẏ &slongdes;&slongdes;e
geh i y r&slongdes;umn i ẏ &slongdes;&slongdes;e

geh i ẏ r
&slongdes;umn i ẏ &slongdes;&slongdes;e
geh i ẏ r&slongdes;umn i ẏ &slongdes;&slongdes;e
forg i y fenn i ẏ &slongdes;&slongdes;e
